name: badGlitches();
description:
badGlitches();

1 whole minute of gameplay!
2 endings!!
3+ things you can click on!!!

Controls:

  • Mouse to look around.
  • Left Click: do stuff.
  • Right Click: zoom look.
  • Keys to type stuff when you're on the computer.

Note:
This experience is a vague reference to the Rae Sremmurd song No Type (an instrumental version plays in the background). At least that's how it started. badGlitches(); ended up becoming an allegory for the growth of my game dev practice. Hope you enjoy it!

Assets and shit not by me:
